title: 47.68 ELECTRONIC FINANCIAL TERMINAL SECURITY.
text: Every person establishing and maintaining an electronic financial terminal and every financial institution using an electronic financial terminal shall adopt and maintain safeguards to insure the safety of funds, items, and other information, which safeguards shall include security devices consistent with the appropriate requirements specified under the federal Bank Protection Act of 1968, Public Law 90-389, or such alternative security precautions as are approved by the commissioner.
